name: Futoku No Guild / Immoral Guild - All-in-One
description:
The silly female cast from Futoku no Guild / Immoral Guild anime :-)

How to use
Use the character name followed by 1girl for the girls and 1girl OR 1boy for Noma.
On NAI this LoRA was trained on this was enough but it seems like on more styled variants like AOM2 you also have to add negatives to avoid traits from other characters spilling over.
For prompt samples please see the images.

Recommended strength is anywhere between 0.75 to 1.00 depending on prompt, model and character.

Misc
512 resolution trained on NAI without noise offset option for best LoRA compatibility. Dataset based on screencaps from the TV-release. Tested on NAI + AOM2.

All images are raw untouched txt2img generations (slightly cherrypicked).

Don't forget to review and upload your own images, it's always fun to see what you're creating!
Like my LoRAs and want more? Please consider a small tip towards my electricity bill and further training >.<
